note.p: Tea dealer. Married Lucy Swift in Derby in 1792. Of Birmingham at the time of his marriage. His two daughters were baptised in Birmingham: Antonietta (1792–1847), who married William Eaton Mousley at Derby in 1816, and Mary, who married Francis Boott at Derby in 1820. Buried in Derby.
